data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Then, a ____ of ____ science ____ a ____ and ____ that ____ use ____ language ____ Galbraith ____ Rowling ____ too ____ to ____ an ____. That was how Rowling's secret identity was revealed.
data.partBlankContent: The famous author J.K. Rowling published a mystery novel under a false name, Robert Galbraith. For a while, the bo___ did n__ get mu__ attention. Then, a prof_____ of comp____ science d__ a st___ and sho___ that t__ use o_ language bet____ Galbraith a__ Rowling w__ too sim____ to b_ an acci____. data.fullContent: The famous author J.K. Rowling published a mystery novel under a false name, Robert Galbraith. For a while, the books did not get much attention. Then, a professor of computer science did a study and showed that the use of language between Galbraith and Rowling was too similar to be an accident. That was how Rowling's secret identity was revealed.
data.answer: 著名作家J.K.罗琳以假名罗伯特·加尔布雷斯出版了一部悬疑小说。有一段时间，这些书没有得到太多关注。然后，一位计算机科学教授做了一项研究，表明加尔布雷斯和罗琳之间的语言使用太相似了，不是偶然的。罗琳的秘密身份就是这样暴露的。
